class.name: Adventurer
class.desc: This class is the basic class, it hasn't any special attributes

specie.name: Human
specie.desc: This specie is the basic specie, it hasn't any special attributes

object.name: Stick
object.desc: A stick you found is the forest, it is rather useless.

_.title: Available commands
_.description: Those are all the commands I know, they all start with l!

fields.name: help *[keyword]*
fields.value: Display a help message

fields.name: rp
fields.value: A fancy RPG game, see usage with `help rp`

rp.title: Help: RPG
rp.description: A fancy RPG games, with combat, inventory and levels management. Features very customisable objects, mobs, classes and species

fields.name: char
fields.value: Character management

fields.name: inv
fields.value: Inventory management

fields.name: room
fields.value: Usage: `room [next]`; display the room or move to the next room

fields.name: admin
fields.value: All the more advanced commandes used by the admins, see `help rp admin` for more informations

fields.name: attack
fields.value: Attack an enemy in the room you are in

fields.name: *empty*
fields.value: Display your character

fields.name: create
fields.value: Create a new character. **WARNING**: It will erase any other character you had in this channel!

fields.name: list
fields.value: List all the characters there is in this channel

fields.name: class
fields.value: Set your character's class

fields.name: specie
fields.value: Set your character's specei. **WARNING**: It might reset your character's stats

fields.name: *empty*
fields.value: Display your inventory

fields.name: desc *<item>*
fields.value: Display one item's description

fields.name: give *<character>*
fields.value: Give an item that you have in your inventory to another character

fields.name: cgive *<character>*
fields.value: Give any item to another character. Use `self` instead of a character's name to give it to yourself

fields.name: hold *<item>*
fields.value: Hold an item (the item that was holded goes back in your inventory)

fields.name: *empty*
fields.value: Display the room

fields.name: next
fields.value: Move to the next room if the room doesn't have any enemies left

fields.name: settings
fields.value: Set all the very advanced settings. **WIP**

fields.name: \*\*RESET\*\*
fields.value: Reset this channel's RPG

fields.name: summon *<mob_name or mob_id>
fields.value: Summon an enemy in the room

fields.name: kill *<mob_name or mob_id>
fields.value: Kill an enemmy in the room

fields.name: presets
fields.value: Preset management

fields.name: object, specie, class, mob
fields.value: Manages the objects, species, classes and mobs. See `help admin assets` for help about this

fields.name: turn
fields.value: Adds 1 to the turn amount

en.init_alert: *Uh oh!* RP is not ready? Let me fix that!
en.init_success: *Haha!* RP is ready, but there's isn't much variety! Add classes/species/items using `l!rp admin specie/class/item create`! You would want to edit the more advanced settings usin `l!rp admin settings`
en.char_init: Hello wanderer! Welcome in our wonderful world! May I know your name?
en.spell_success: This spell worked like a charm!
en.skill_assign_success: Successfully assigned one point to the `[[name]]` stat!
en.rarity: Found when difficulty is higher than `[[min_difficulty]]`, but is best found when the difficulty is higher than `[[difficulty]]`. This item is [[rarity]].
en.rarity_max_difficulty: Found when difficulty is higher than `[[min_difficulty]]`, is best found when the difficulty is higher than `[[difficulty]]` and lower than `[[max_difficulty]]`. This item is [[rarity]].
en.error_no_char: I don't know you! First introduce you using `l!rp char create`
en.error_char_no_class: You don't have any class? Assign yourself one using `l!rp char class`!
en.error_char_no_specie: You don't have any specie? Assign yourself one using `l!rp char specie`!
en.error_char_class_invalid: The class you have is invalid, it may have been deleted. Assign yourself a new one using `l!rp char class`
en.error_char_specie_invalid: The specie you have is invalid, it may have been deleted. Assign yourself a new one using `l!rp char specie`
en.error_no_class: *Uh oh!* There aren't any classes? I can't do that without any! Create one using `l!rp admin class create`! You might continue to initalise your character using `l!rp char class`
en.error_no_specie: *Uh oh!* There aren't any species? I can't do that without any! Create one using `l!rp admin specie create`! You might continue to initalise your character using `l!rp char specie`
en.error_no_mob: There aren't any monsters defined! Create one using `l!rp admin mob create`
en.error_no_object: There aren't any objects defined! Create one using `l!rp admin object create`
en.error_no_room: The room hasn't been initialised yet! Do it using `l!rp room init`
en.error_no_mob_in_room: This room hasn't any mob in it!
en.error_char_ask_class_syntax: *Huh?* I didn't quite get your class name!
en.error_char_ask_specie_syntax: *Huh?* I didn't quite get your specie name!
en.error_mob_name_syntax: The mob you were looking for apparently does not exists!
en.error_attr_syntax: The syntax of an `attr` is wrong, please check config.
en.error_item_not_in_possession: You don't have this item in your inventory!
en.error_not_enough_item_in_possession: You don't have enough of this item to give!
en.error_preset_not_found: Sorry, I haven't found the preset you were looking for!
en.error_spell_not_found: Nothing happened. Your spell doesn't seems to be working...
en.error_not_enough_MP: You don't have any MP left! You should take a rest!
en.error_not_enough_skill_points: You don't have any skill points left! Level up to get more!
en.error_stat_syntax: This is not an available stat, sorry
en.error_dead: Err... Sorry? Deads are dead, they can't do that!
en.error_item_not_in_room: Sorry, I couldn't find the item you were looking for!
en.error_use_item: Sorry, the item you were trying to use cannt be used that way!

stairs.name: Stairs
stairs.desc: Those stairs leads downwards. You cannot see where it leads
